name: The Great Descent
description:
Descend to the bottom of the abyss and reach the exit of each level! The camera will continuously lower into the abyss and you have to follow it down. Don't go too fast or else you'll pass the camera, but don't go to slow or else you'll get left behind!

Controls:

Use the left and right arrow keys to move.

Press the spacebar to jump.

FAQ's:

Q: Why can I stick to the side of platforms and the walls?

A: The playable character has a pickaxe. He is able to use the pickaxe to hold onto the wall and ledges.

Q: What can be expected in upcoming versions?

A: More levels. Perhaps even enemies to avoid throughout these future levels. Improved graphics.

Q: Who is the main character?

A: His name is Thomas! He is a miner attempting to descend to the bottom of this abyss.
